channel.title: Ithuvia | Inside Intel
channel.description: Mission Control for student founders. Tactical AI workflows, side-hustle blueprints, and the 2026 Sovereign Protocol.

item.title: Mission 001: The Inaugural Manifesto â€” Why Ithuvia is a War Room, Not a Newsletter
item.description: The university OS is obsolete. Ithuvia exists to bridge the gap between static curriculum and the 2026 AI economy. This briefing decrypts our "Mission Control" philosophy and the transition from Passive Consumer to Sovereign Creator. Stop scrolling. Start shipping.
